product_name: The North Face Cat's Meow Sleeping Bag
long_description: The North Face Cat's Meow sleeping bag meets the needs of 3-season backpackers looking to save a little weight and gain a cozy night's sleep. Climashield(R) Prism synthetic insulation is warm, light and compressible. Top shell features extremely lightweight, wind- and water-resistant Firestorm(TM) fabric; taffeta bottom shell defends against grit/abrasion. Forehead comfort tube, insulated chest-level Heat Trap baffle and oversized draft tube backing the snag-free zipper minimize heat loss. Welded, shoulder-level zip pocket keeps watch, glasses or other necessities within easy reach. Vaulted footbox offers ergonomic comfort and warmth for your feet. Hood features 1-hand-adjustable, color-coded drawcords; glow-in-the-dark zipper pulls make adjustments easy at night. The North Face Cat's Meow sleeping bag comes with a compression stuff sack and nylon/mesh storage bag.
short_description: The North Face Cat's Meow sleeping bag meets the needs of 3-season backpackers looking to save a little weight and gain a cozy night's sleep.
